title: Punkie Johnson - The Resurrection! • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #195
itunes:title: Punkie Johnson - The Resurrection! • Films To Be Buried With with Brett Goldstein #195
itunes:subtitle: LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! THE RESURRECTION! Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the glorious and hilarious comic and actor PUNKIE JOHNSON!
description:
LOOK OUT! It’s only Films To Be Buried With! THE RESURRECTION!

Join your host Brett Goldstein as he talks life, death, love and the universe with the glorious and hilarious comic and actor PUNKIE JOHNSON!


Round 2! Up steps Punkie for another episode and you will be ever so glad it’s happened, as this is definitely one for the books. Punkie was brilliant on first appearance, and with Brett bringing her back from the dead, we get another chance to hear even more of the story - and SO much has happened. We go in deep from the first moments, and throughout it’s a perfect balance of genuine funny and heartfelt goodness. No spoilers but just trust that this one will warm your heart and soul and we hope for some kind of round 3 - who knows how that will manifest but ANYWAY, enjoy this one!


PUNKIE LINKS

CORNERBOYS with BRETT & SCROOBIUS PIP
